text: Nicholas Joseph Begich III (born October 21, 1977) is an American businessman and politician. He is the member of the U.S. House of Representatives for Alaska's at-large congressional district since 2025. He beat Democratic incumbent Mary Peltola in the 2024 election. He ran for the seat in 2022, but lost the election to Peltola. His grandfather, Nick Begich Sr., was also the U.S. Representative for Alaska's at-large congressional district. His uncle, Mark Begich, is a former U.S. Senator. ==References== ==Other websites== * Nick Begich for Alaska campaign website * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Anchorage, Alaska Category:Businesspeople from Anchorage, Alaska Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:United States representatives from Alaska
title: Nick Begich III
